comment.author: 50178914@N06
comment._content: The is the Burnelli GX-3, an experimental craft that introduced patented designs that are in use on all airliners today; the Variable Wing Camber, to extend leading and trailing wing edges for more lift and the Wing Tip End Plating (now called winglets). More up-to-date winglets can be seen on Burnelli's 1951 BWB and early 60's, supersonic airliner design. Read more about Burnelli's designs here: www.burnelliaircraft.com/
